text.value: What is the name of the main respondent
What is the relationship of the main respondent to the deceased child?
On the way to a facility
What is the hospital/health facility name?
What is the hospital/health facility address?
Could you tell me about the illness that led to the baby's death?
List all items from previous open history question
Is the number of days of illness preceding the child's death known?
How many days did the illness start immediately preceding the child's death?
Was care sought outside the home while s/he had this illness
Is the number of days care was sought after illness started known?
How many days after illness started was care sought?
Did you seek care anywhere else?
Did s/he die from an injury or accident?
What kind of injury or accident?
Did s/he die at the site where the accident or injury occurred?
For how long after accident or injury did s/he survive?
Did the child receive medical care from the accident before death?
Did the child have an ongoing chronic illness or was s/he sick in the month before the accident or injury?
Was the child growing normally for his/her age?
Did the child get more sicknesses or illnesses than other children in the family or in the community
During the illness that led to death, did s/he have fever?
Is the number of days the fever lasted known?
How many days did the fever last?
During the illness that led to death, did s/he have diarrhoea?
More frequent or more liquid stools than usual.
Is the number of days stools were more frequent or liquid known?
For how many days were the stools more frequent or liquid?
On the day when the diarrhoea was most severe, is the number of times s/he passed stool known?
How many times did he/she pass stool?
Was there visible blood in the stool?
Did the child have sunken eyes when he/she was ill with diarrhoea?
During the diarrhoea episode, was the child given any fluids such as ORS?
Is the number of days of s/he had vomiting known?
How many days did s/he have vomiting?
When vomiting was severe, is the number of times s/he vomited known?
When vomiting was severe, how many times did s/he vomit in a day?
How did the vomit look like?
During the illness that led to death, did the child have abdominal pains
What type of pain was it?
Is the number of days s/he had pain known?
How many days did s/he have the pain?
What was the severity of the pain?
Was s/he unable to pass stool for some days before day?
During the illness that led to death, did the child have abdominal distension?
Is the number of days of abdominal distension known?
For how many days did s/he have abdominal distension?
Did the distension develop rapidly within days or slowly?
During the illness that led to death, did the child have a cough?
Is the number of days cough lasted known?
For how many days did the cough last?
During the illness that led to death, did the child have difficulty in breathing?
Is the number of days difficult breathing lasted known?
For how many days did the difficulty in breathing last?
During the illness that led to death, did the child have fast breathing?
Is the number of days fast breathing lasted known?
For how many days did the fast breathing last?
During the illness that led to death, did s/he have skin rash?
Was the rash all over the body?
Was the rash on the child's face?
Is the number of days the rash lasted known?
For how many days did the rash last?
Did the rash have blisters containing clear fluids?
Did the skin crack/split or peel after the rash started?
During the illness that led to death, did the child become very thin?
During the illness that led to death, did the child have swollen legs or feet?
Is the number of days the swelling lasted known?
How long (days) did the swelling last?
During the illness that lead to death, did the child's skin flake off in patches?
Did the child's hair change in colour to a reddish (or yellowish) colour?
Did the child have generalized body swelling during the month before he/she died?
Was the child miserable in the month prior to the death?
Did the child have wasting and appears like an old man (marasmus) during the month before he/she died?
During the illness that led to death, did the child suffer from lack of blood or appear pale?
During the illness that led to death, did the child have pale palms?
During the illness that led to death, did the child have white nails?
During the illness that led to death, did the child have swellings in the armpit?
During the illness that led to death, did the child have swellings in the groin?
During the illness that led to death, did the child have swellings in the neck?
During the illness that led to death, did the child have a whitish rash inside the mouth or on the tongue?
During the illness that led to death, did s/he chest in drawing?
During the illness that led to death, did s/he have wheezing?
Did the child experience any generalized convulsions/fits during the illness that led to death?
Was the child unconscious during the illness that led to death?
Any any time during the illness that led to death, did the child stop being able to grasp?
How long before s/he died did the child stop being able to grasp?
At any time during the illness that led to death, did the child stop being able to respond to a voice?
How long before s/he die did the child stop being able to respond to a voice?
At any time during the illness that led to the death of child, was the child unable to follow movements with eyes?
How long before s/he died did the child stop being able to follow movements with eyes?
Did the child have stiff neck during the illness that led to death?
Did the child have bulging fontanel during the illness that led to death?
Did s/he receive any drug during the illness
Did s/he receive any antibiotics during the illness?
Did s/he receive any anti-malaria drug during the illness?
Which anti-malaria drug did s/he receive?

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Permanent Id is not the right format
House Id is not the right format
Field Worker Id is not the right format
The date of the interview cannot be in the future
The date of the birth of child cannot be before the interview date
The date of death must be between the date of birth and interview date
